causes_communes: Rallying at a pace they can't control

debutant: Work on having great technique, control, and consistency.
Do drills where you focus on hitting the ball within six inches or so of where you are aiming for control.

exercices_complementaires.description: Do drills where you focus on hitting the ball within six inches or so of where you are aiming.

metriques_progression: Count how many shots you can do in a drill to work on consistency.
